intent_atoms.description: Implement validation rule #15 to correlate stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and the new stco/co64 chunk offsets.
Validation rule #15 must correctly correlate stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 chunk offsets according to integration notes.
Evaluate additional handler type categorizations if future boxes require specialized roles beyond the current mapping set.
Handler type categorizations must be evaluated and documented once refined.
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners come online.
Benchmarks can only run when macOS automation with Instruments support is available.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export and hardware-dependent QA once runners are available.
Release readiness tasks must be executed following the runbook.
Execute random slice benchmark suite on mac‑to‑s?

functional_units.name: stco/co64 Chunk Offset Parser
functional_units.description: Parses stco and co64 chunks to emit normalized offsets for both 32‑bit and 64‑bit entries

functional_units.name: Validation Rule #15
functional_units.description: Correlates stsc chunk runs, stsz/stz2 sample sizes, and stco/co64 chunk offsets to ensure consistency

functional_units.name: hdlr Handler Type Categorization
functional_units.description: Parses hdlr boxes and maps handler types to specialized roles

functional_units.name: macOS CLI/UI Large‑File Benchmark Execution
functional_units.description: Runs large‑file performance benchmarks using the R4 protocol on macOS hardware

functional_units.name: Release Readiness Validation
functional_units.description: Generates DocC documentation, notarizes builds, exports TestFlight packages, and performs hardware‑dependent QA for release readiness

functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmark Suite Execution
functional_units.description: Executes random slice benchmark tests on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers

functional_units.name: ParseTree Streaming Selection Automation Tests
functional_units.description: Runs XCTest UI automation to validate SwiftUI streaming selection flow

functional_units.name: Combine‑backed UI Benchmark
functional_units.description: Captures latency metrics for Combine‑based UI benchmarks on macOS while maintaining CLI throughput parity
